page.title: 14THE HAMLET OF THIRTLEBY
page.content: Thirtleby is a small village there are about 13 houses and 33 people. You don't get much traffic going through. Thirtleby is mainly a farming area, there is also a lot of crops around. You mainly see farm vehicles like tractors and landrovers. Most people in Thirtleby have pets. There are very small roads . Most of the houses in Thirtleby are bungalows and cottages. The Grange is the biggest house there. It must be very quiet living in the hamlet because there are no shops or common buildings and only a few street lights so there is not a lot to do on a night especially for children. But if you want the quiet life then Thirtleby is an ideal place for you.
